snippet: After TNT announces that it is canceling “Dallas,” fans of the show start an online petition to try to keep it alive.
abstract: After TNT announces that it is canceling “Dallas,” fans of the show start an online petition to try to keep it alive.

headline.main: 'Dallas' Fans Want TNT to Cancel Cancellation
headline.print_headline: ‘Dallas’ Fans Want TNT To Cancel Cancellation
